trans-unit.source: Represents time in divisions, such as months, days, and years.
trans-unit.target: 表示劃分的時間，例如月、日和年。

trans-unit.source: Years are calculated using the Gregorian calendar, while days and months are calculated using the lunisolar calendar.
trans-unit.target: 年份是使用西曆計算，而日期和月份則是使用陰陽曆計算。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar> class is derived from the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar> class, which represents the lunisolar calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar>類別衍生自<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar>類別，其代表陰陽曆。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar> class supports the sexagenary year cycle (which repeats every 60 years) in addition to solar years and lunar months.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar>類別支援六十年的年度週期 （會重複每隔 60 年） 除了陽曆年和月農曆。

trans-unit.source: Each solar year in the calendar is associated with a Sexagenary Year, a Celestial Stem, and a Terrestrial Branch, and these calendars can have leap months after any month of the year.
trans-unit.target: 在行事曆中的每一個陽曆年六十年的年度、 科學 Stem 和糔礜惎纕分支，與相關聯，且這些行事曆可以有任何一年的月份的閏月。

trans-unit.source: For information about using the <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar> class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用<xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar>類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar> class calculates years using the Gregorian calendar, and days and months using the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar>類別計算年份使用西曆，以及日期和數個月使用<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar>類別。

trans-unit.source: A leap month can occur after any month in a year.
trans-unit.target: 為閏月可能會發生任何一年的月份。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法傳回的數字，介於 1 到 13，表示相關聯的指定日期的月份。

trans-unit.source: If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.
trans-unit.target: 如果年份的第八個和第九個月之間沒有閏月<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法會傳回 8 閏第八個月的 9 和 10 的第九個月份的第八個月份。

trans-unit.source: Currently, the <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar> is not used by any of the cultures supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前，<xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar>不是由任何支援的文化特性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, this class can be used only to calculate dates in the Korean lunisolar calendar.
trans-unit.target: 因此，這個類別可用於只計算的韓文陰陽曆。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> supports a set of calendars.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>支援一組的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性會傳回預設的行事曆文化特性，而<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>屬性會傳回陣列，其中包含所有支援的文化特性的行事曆。

trans-unit.source: To change the calendar used by a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, the application should set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a new <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更所使用的行事曆<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，應用程式應該設定<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>屬性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>至新<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of days in the year that precedes the year specified by the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> 屬性指定之年的前一年的天數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the year that precedes the year specified by <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> 指定之年的前一年的天數。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a constant value of 384.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回 384 常數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the eras that correspond to the range of dates and times supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應至目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 物件所支援之日期與時間範圍的紀元。

trans-unit.source: An array of 32-bit signed integers that specify the relevant eras.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號整數的陣列，指定相關的紀元。

trans-unit.source: The return value for a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> object is always an array containing one element equal to the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.GregorianEra" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 物件的傳回值永遠是包含一個與 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.GregorianEra" /> 值相等項目的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the era that corresponds to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對應於指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 之紀元。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示 <paramref name="time" /> 參數指定的紀元。

trans-unit.source: The return value for a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> object is always the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.GregorianEra" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 物件的傳回值一定是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.GregorianEra" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> represents a date and time less than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> or greater than <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 表示日期和時間小於 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> 或大於 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Gregorian era that corresponds to the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定對應到目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 物件的西元。

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is 1.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位的值為 1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar> class recognizes only the current era.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar>類別會辨識目前的紀元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得受 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 類別所支援的日期和時間的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the last moment of February 10, 2051 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最晚的日期和時間所支援<see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" />類別，這相當於 2051 年 2 月 10，西元最後一刻

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得受 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> 類別所支援的日期和時間的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the first moment of February 14, 918 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早日期和時間所支援<see cref="T:System.Globalization.KoreanLunisolarCalendar" />類別，這就相當於 918 年 2 月 14，西元第一個快照

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 西曆。
